title: Yuuki no Hana ga Hiraku Toki: Yanase Takashi to Anpanman no Monogatari
original_name: 勇気の花がひらくとき やなせたかしとアンパンマンの物語
sinopse: A biographical anime about Sore Ike! Anpanman creator Takashi Yanase, based on Kumiko Kakehashi's novel of the same name, and celebrates what would have been the 100th birthday of the manga creator.
